item.title: How to Query the Product Hunt API Responsibly with Python
item.description: I recently wrote an article for Pierre and Kevin over at ScrapingBee which was very well received over at Hacker News. It focused on retrieving details for the 90,000+ featured products from Product Hunt API and digging into interesting facets of the data. I was excited to see it sat at the #1 spot on Hacker News for 4 hours whilst I repeatedly took screenshots to regale my children with in later life.
